articles.title: What is Feral File?
articles.description: See how artists, curators, and institutions—including MoMA and the Buffalo AKG—collaborate with Feral File to exhibit and collect digital art.

articles.title: How to Collect Digital Art
articles.description: A guide for institutions on collecting digital art with blockchain—ensuring secure, lasting, and accessible stewardship for the future.

articles.title: Research
articles.description: We experiment with new ways to experience digital art—exploring time-based works, community-driven projects, and blockchain as a creative tool.

articles.title: FAQ
articles.description: Learn in-depth how Feral File works.

articles.title: Collector Services
articles.description: From acquisitions to display, we help collectors care for and engage with digital art—confidentially and with attention to detail.
